title: Tristana glitches in game
body:
I don't have any pictures of this, but I've been noticing Tristana glitch a lot. I've found a few bugs of her and one really weird thing that was more funny then weird. The bugs I've found:

1: When Tristana runs her gun is normal, but when she stops instead of her old *gun goes foward and back* it actually glitches and goes on her shoulder. (I don't main Tristana so I can't be too sure about this one)
2: Her dancing used to be she puts her gun next to her standing up, then dances like a soldier next to it. Every time I dance with her she glitches and grabs the back of the gun, then dances while holding the gun. The gun goes through her face and it's just funny.
3: The funny bug I found: So me and my friend Nikeman58 were playing as a Brand and I Tristana, and we were on bottom lane. We were pushing up a Zyra and an Ashe I think (this and the Tristana bugs were a while ago, just never got around to posting it) and we pushed them all the way to the turret but when we were falling back a bit we saw what looked like a half sword half pin thing and it was at a I'ma say 30* (can't do the dot thing) tilt   in the ground. It was also spinning not too fast but pretty fast and it was just barely off the ground. He and I saw it there and it wouldn't go. Also it would always go in front of our champs, not behind. Didn't get a picture of that one either but I badly drew it in paint. 

If anyone else has noticed these glitches tell me, if there are any Tristana glitches I missed tell me too. I don't care if you fix these Riot (because they're pretty funny) just thought you'd like to know about them and stuff so if you want to you can fix them.

replies.body:
Hey MonoTheMighty ,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and working to fix it!
